title: Strategies for reducing carbon dioxide emissions

content.prompt: Which of the following is most likely to reduce the United States contribution to the increase in concentration of atmospheric CO2?

choices.label: Requiring all farming practices to be organic
Switching fuel use for residential heating from oil to coal
Switching from cars and trucks to rail for mass transit and freight movement

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
